jp_text: ハッ！ こ… これは すごい！

en_text: It was well worth seeing.
jp_text: やるじゃないか

en_text: With this, Luna Nova should have\Nno more reason to conduct the ritual sacrifice.
jp_text:
もう いけにえの儀式を
行うことはなさそうですね
google_translated:
Another ritual
It seems not to do

en_text: You did it, Akko.
jp_text: （アーシュラ）やったわね アッコ

en_text: Wasn't that fun, Akko?
jp_text: 楽しかったね アッコ

en_text: Diana!
jp_text: （ワンガリ）ダイアナ！―

en_text: What about Akko's group?
jp_text: アッコたちは？

en_text: But they sure did do a nice thing.
jp_text:
でも
いいもん見せてもらったよね？
google_translated:
but
You've seen a good thing, right?

en_text: There's the award ceremony coming up, so get ready.
jp_text:
授賞式があるから
準備しておいて！―
google_translated:
Because there is a ceremonial ceremony
Prepare!-

en_text: Back to Akko! She's so moved by breaking Vajarois' curse that she can hardly speak through the tears!
jp_text:
バハロワの呪いを解いた感動から
むせび泣いております！
google_translated:
From the impression that solved the curse of Bahalois
I'm crying!

en_text: That has filled me with this emotion?
jp_text:
わたくしは
なぜ こんな気持ちになるの？
google_translated:
I
Why do you feel like this?

en_text: Chasing after a shooting star
jp_text:
♪夢中になって
　　　追いかけてた

en_text: Longing to know more about this world
jp_text: ♪広がる世界を知りたくて
google_translated: ♪ I want to know the spreading world

en_text: kanaetai to negau dake ja nai
jp_text: ♪叶えたいと

en_text: But if you only push open the door
jp_text: ♪扉を開ければ ほら

en_text: Let's go on a journey to find\Nthe next page of our story
jp_text: ♪待ちきれない物語の
google_translated: ♪ Of a story that can not wait

en_text: The scenery may be ever-changing
jp_text: ♪景色は

en_text: I'll never let go of the\Ntreasures we collected together
jp_text: ♪変わっていくけど

en_text: Thank you for staying by my side
jp_text:
♪側にいてくれて
　　　　　ありがとう
google_translated:
♪ I'm on the side
     Thank you

en_text: See you tomorrow
jp_text: ♪また明日ね
google_translated: ♪ I will see you again tomorrow
